title: A Cross-Sectional Study on Social Phobia Among Medical Undergraduates of Ahmedabad City
summary: A medical research study examining the prevalence and patterns of social phobia among medical students in Ahmedabad, India. The study appears to be aimed at understanding anxiety disorders in the medical student population.
content:
The study focuses on investigating social phobia among medical undergraduate students in Ahmedabad city. The research employs a cross-sectional methodology to examine the prevalence and impact of social anxiety disorder within this specific demographic. While the full content details are not provided in the source material, the study represents an important investigation into mental health concerns among medical students in an urban Indian setting.

The research was conducted in medical institutions within Ahmedabad, suggesting a focus on understanding and addressing mental health challenges faced by future healthcare professionals during their training period.

source.title: A Cross-Sectional Study on Social Phobia Among Medical Undergraduates of Ahmedabad City
